fullText:
Death Knell [Divinity]

Prerequisite: Channel Divinity class feature, must worship a deity of the death domain
Benefit: You gain the Channel Divinity power death knell.


Feat UtilityDeath Knell

Death comes to all, and your god counts on you to hasten the moment.

Encounter      Divine
Minor Action      Melee touch

Channel Divinity: You can use only one channel divinity power per encounter

Target: One bloodied creature

Effect: If the targetâ€™s current hit points equal 5 + one-half your level or fewer, it drops to 0 hit points. Otherwise, you can use one of your other Channel Divinity powers during this encounter.


Published in Divine Power, page(s) 111.
name: Death Knell
prerequisite: Channel Divinity class feature, must worship a deity of the death domain
benefit: You gain the Channel Divinity power death knell.
